identity.mission: Create a minimal, high-utility internal tool that feels like a Swiss instrumentâ€”precise, clean, and reliable.

login.structure: Centered card on a subtle dot-pattern or gray background.
login.visuals: Minimalist, focus on the form. Use a 'lock' icon or abstract logo.

cookie_paste.structure: Split view or Vertical stack: Large Textarea (top/left) + Validation Feedback (bottom/right).
cookie_paste.elements: Textarea must be 'font-mono' and tall (h-96). Validation messages should be prominent alerts.

cookie_list.structure: Table view for density, or wide Cards for detail.
cookie_list.interactions: Click row to expand details. Toggle switches for status. Copy button with toast feedback.
cookie_list.styles: Use 'Table' component from shadcn. Row hover effects: 'hover:bg-muted/50'.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise or dot pattern on the main background to reduce sterility.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-md for dropdowns/modals. Avoid heavy shadows.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders in #e2e8f0. No fuzzy borders.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Work Sans' for all headings and 'Inter' for body text. Load them via Google Fonts.
For the 'Notepad' feel in the paste page, use a large textarea with 'font-mono' and 'bg-muted/30'.
Ensure the 'Sold' and 'Expired' toggles update visually instantly (optimistic UI) and persist state.
The 'Get Link' button should simply show a toast or change text to 'Link Generated' (mock functionality).
Use 'sonner' for all notifications (copy success, validation errors).
Strictly follow the 'Anti-AI' rule: Do not use generic purple/teal gradients. Stick to the monochrome + stark accent palette.
Implement a 'Logout' button in the layout header.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts for the dashboard; use a sidebar or top-nav structure.
Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetics (shiny gradients, excessive glassmorphism). Keep it matte and clean.
Use 2x-3x spacing (p-6, p-8) to let content breathe, even in this minimal tool.
All interactive elements must have 'data-testid' attributes.
